video_prompt: Close-up of a woman's face. Her head tilts, eyes gaze upwards. Iridescent hair shimmers and flows around her as sparkling glitter continuously appears and fades on her skin and hair. The background subtly swirls and blends.
image_prompt:
**Prompt:**

Highly stylized vibrant painting of a beautiful young woman, chest up, head tilted back looking up and right. Fair luminous wet-look skin with glossy coral-pink lips. Striking vibrant blue eyes with long dark eyelashes, natural brown eyebrows, and soft rosy blush with glitter accents. Iridescent pastel hair (silver, lavender, pink, light blue) with reflective silver lines and sparkling glitter dots, also on skin. Soft pastel blended background with subtle swirls. Features a metallic "C29" logo in the bottom right corner. Ethereal, glamorous, fantastical, magical, whimsical, highly detailed, polished, blend of realism and fantasy.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's head slowly tilts, her eyes shifting upwards in a gentle gaze. Iridescent hair dynamically shimmers and flows around her. Sparkling glitter continuously materializes and dissolves across her skin and hair. The background fluidly swirls and blends, creating subtle motion.
